name: WheelchairRecoil
description:
Made for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam in 12 hours.

Mr. Wilson was watching some TV in his nursing home, when suddenly some zombies broke the walls and started ruining his TV time. So he picked up his gun and he started shooting some heads.

The idea is : A top down wave shooter game where you cannot move, you can only  use the recoil of your guns as movement.
